short_summary: fournir des évaluations des difficultés d'apprentissage des délinquants identifiés pour appuyer les interventions en matière d'apprentissage qui sont souvent menées avec succès.
description: fournir des évaluations des difficultés d'apprentissage des délinquants identifiés afin de mieux soutenir les interventions menées en matière d'apprentissage.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Learning Disabilities Assessments

## Tender Details

* **Title (English) :** Learning Disabilities Assessments
* **Title (French) :** Évaluations des Difficultés d’apprentissage 
* **Reference Number :** cb-860-75569875
* **Solicitation Number :** 50100-23-3872880-A

## Tender Status
* **Tender Closing Date :** February 9, 2024, at 3:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date :** March 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date :** March 31, 2027

## Tender Notice Type and Procurement Method 
* **Notice Type (English) :** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice Type (French) :** Demande de propositions (DP)
* **Procurement Method :** Competitive - Open Bidding

## Location
* **Collection Site(s) :** Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Alberta
* **End-User Entities :** Correctional Service Canada

## Tender Description
We are seeking proposals from experienced service providers to offer learning disabilities assessments for identified offenders. This service will support a successful learning intervention and enhance rehabilitation outcomes.

## Contact Information
* **Name :** Teri Fraser
* **Email :** [501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* **Phone :** (306) 659-9300
* **Contact Person’s Title :** 

## Attachments
All tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's procurement platform. Please access the following links for more information:
- [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30185/-WO14482-SO-S-RFP-18Apr2023.pdf
,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30185/afr_471-e_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30185/50100-23-3872880-A-NPP-ENG-FINAL.pdf)
- [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30185/-WO14482-SO-S-RFP-18Apr2023.pdf
,https://canadabuys.canada
